grammar.title: Grammar Practice Test
grammar.description: Test your understanding of A1 grammar concepts

questions.question: Which article is correct: 'I have ___ apple.'
questions.explanation: Use 'an' before words that start with vowel sounds (a, e, i, o, u).

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'She ___ a student.'
questions.explanation: Use 'is' with he/she/it in present simple.

questions.question: Which is correct: 'This is ___ book.'
questions.explanation: Use 'my' as a possessive adjective before nouns.

questions.question: Complete: 'They ___ from London.'
questions.explanation: Use 'are' with they/we/you in present simple.

questions.question: Which question is correct?
questions.explanation: Use 'do/does' to form questions in present simple.

questions.question: What color is the sky on a sunny day?
questions.explanation: The sky is typically blue on sunny days.

questions.question: Which word means 'not big'?
questions.explanation: Small is the opposite of big.

questions.question: What do you call your mother's sister?
questions.explanation: Your mother's sister is your aunt.

questions.question: Which is a fruit?
questions.explanation: Apple is a fruit, the others are vegetables.

questions.question: What do you use to write on paper?
questions.explanation: A pen is used to write on paper.

questions.audioText: Hi, I'm Maria. I'm 25 years old. I live in Madrid. I'm a teacher.
questions.question: How old is Maria?
questions.explanation: Maria says she is 25 years old.

questions.audioText: My phone number is 555-1234. Please call me tomorrow.
questions.question: What is the phone number?
questions.explanation: The speaker says the number is 555-1234.

questions.audioText: The weather is sunny and warm today. It's perfect for a walk.
questions.question: What is the weather like?
questions.explanation: The speaker says it's sunny and warm.

questions.audioText: I like pizza and pasta. My favorite food is Italian.
questions.question: What is the person's favorite food?
questions.explanation: The speaker says their favorite food is Italian.

questions.audioText: The meeting is at 3 PM tomorrow. Don't be late.
questions.question: When is the meeting?
questions.explanation: The speaker says the meeting is tomorrow at 3 PM.

questions.text: WANTED: English teacher for children. Part-time, weekends. Call 555-0123.
questions.question: What job is being offered?
questions.explanation: The ad says 'English teacher for children'.

questions.text: Hi Maria, Thank you for your email. I am happy to help you with your English homework. Please come to my office tomorrow at 2:00 PM. Best regards, Mr. Johnson
questions.question: Who is the email from?
questions.explanation: The email is signed 'Mr. Johnson'.

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
questions.explanation: EXIT means the way out.

questions.text: Hi! Are you free tomorrow? Let's meet for coffee at 3 PM.
questions.question: What does the person want to do?
questions.explanation: The message says 'Let's meet for coffee'.

questions.question: When does this place close?
questions.explanation: The sign shows closing time is 6:00 PM.

finalAssessment.title: A1 Final Assessment
finalAssessment.description: Complete evaluation of your A1 level skills

speaking.title: Speaking Assessment
speaking.description: Record your responses to speaking prompts

questions.prompt: Introduce yourself. Say your name, age, where you're from, and what you do.
Describe your family. Talk about your parents, siblings, and where you live.
Ask for directions to the nearest restaurant.

writing.title: Writing Assessment
writing.description: Complete writing tasks to demonstrate your skills

tasks.task: Write a short email to a friend about your weekend plans.
Fill out a hotel registration form with your personal information.
Write a short note to your roommate about a meeting tomorrow.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Test
comprehensive.description: Mixed questions covering all A1 skills

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: Use 'a/an' before singular countable nouns.

questions.question: What is the opposite of 'hot'?
questions.explanation: Cold is the opposite of hot.

questions.audioText: My name is John. I'm from Canada. I speak English and French.
questions.question: What languages does John speak?
questions.explanation: John says he speaks English and French.

questions.text: FOR SALE: Red car, 2018, good condition. $5,000. Phone: 555-0456
questions.question: How much does the car cost?
questions.explanation: The ad shows the price is $5,000.

questions.question: Complete: 'She ___ her homework every day.'
questions.explanation: Use 'does' with he/she/it in present simple.

certificate.title: A1 Level Certificate
certificate.description: Certificate of completion for A1 level

grammar.title: A2 Grammar Practice Test
grammar.description: Test your understanding of A2 grammar concepts including past simple, present continuous, and modal verbs

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'I ___ to the cinema last weekend.'
questions.explanation: Use 'went' (past simple) for completed actions in the past.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: Use present continuous (am/is/are + -ing) for actions happening now.

questions.question: Complete: 'This is ___ book I have ever read.'
questions.explanation: Use 'the best' (superlative) when comparing one thing to all others.

questions.question: Which modal verb is correct: 'You ___ see a doctor if you feel sick.'
questions.explanation: Use 'should' for advice or recommendations.

questions.question: Complete: 'I ___ to visit my grandmother next week.'
questions.explanation: Use 'going to' for planned future actions.

questions.question: Which preposition is correct: 'I'll meet you ___ 3 PM.'
questions.explanation: Use 'at' for specific times.

questions.question: Complete: 'She ___ her keys yesterday.'
questions.explanation: Use 'lost' (past simple) for completed actions in the past.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the present continuous correctly?
questions.explanation: Present continuous requires 'am/is/are' + verb + -ing.

questions.question: Complete: 'This restaurant is ___ than the other one.'
questions.explanation: Use 'more + adjective' for comparative forms of long adjectives.

questions.question: Which modal verb expresses ability?
questions.explanation: 'Can' expresses ability or possibility.

vocabulary.title: A2 Vocabulary Practice Test
vocabulary.description: Test your A2 vocabulary knowledge including shopping, travel, health, and work terms

questions.question: What do you call a reduction in price?
questions.explanation: A discount is a reduction in price.

questions.question: Which word means 'pain in your head'?
questions.explanation: A headache is pain in your head.

questions.question: What do you call a person you work with?
questions.explanation: A colleague is a person you work with.

questions.question: Which word means 'a gentle wind'?
questions.explanation: A breeze is a gentle wind.

questions.question: What do you call an activity you do for pleasure in your free time?
questions.explanation: A hobby is an activity you do for pleasure in your free time.

questions.question: Which word means 'a piece of paper showing what you bought'?
questions.explanation: A receipt shows what you bought and how much you paid.

questions.question: What do you call a planned meeting with a doctor?
questions.explanation: An appointment is a planned meeting with a doctor.

questions.question: Which word means 'the place you are traveling to'?
questions.explanation: A destination is the place you are traveling to.

questions.question: What do you call a funny movie or show?
questions.explanation: A comedy is a funny movie, play, or show.

questions.question: Which word means 'the money you earn for your work'?
questions.explanation: A salary is the money you earn for your work.

listening.title: A2 Listening Practice Test
listening.description: Test your listening comprehension skills with everyday conversations and announcements

questions.question: Listen to the conversation: 'Excuse me, where are the fitting rooms?' 'They're on the second floor, next to the escalator.' Where are the fitting rooms?
questions.explanation: The fitting rooms are on the second floor.

questions.question: Listen to the announcement: 'Flight BA123 to London is now boarding at Gate 7. Please have your boarding pass ready.' What flight is boarding?
questions.explanation: Flight BA123 is boarding.

questions.question: Listen to the conversation: 'I have a terrible headache.' 'You should take some medicine and rest.' What should the person do?
questions.explanation: The person should take medicine and rest.

questions.question: Listen to the weather report: 'Today will be sunny with a high of 25 degrees Celsius.' What's the weather like today?
questions.explanation: Today will be sunny.

questions.question: Listen to the conversation: 'What's your hobby?' 'I love reading novels and going to concerts.' What are the person's hobbies?
questions.explanation: The person's hobbies are reading novels and going to concerts.

reading.title: A2 Reading Practice Test
reading.description: Test your reading comprehension with short texts about everyday situations

questions.question: Read the text: 'SALE! All items 50% off this weekend only. Don't miss this great opportunity to save money on clothing, electronics, and home goods.' What is happening this weekend?
questions.explanation: There's a 50% off sale this weekend.

questions.question: Read the text: 'Dear Mr. Johnson, Thank you for your application. We would like to invite you for an interview on Friday, March 15th at 2:00 PM. Please bring your resume and arrive 10 minutes early.' What should Mr. Johnson bring to the interview?
questions.explanation: Mr. Johnson should bring his resume.

questions.question: Read the text: 'Weather Forecast: Today will be cloudy with occasional rain. High temperature 18°C, low temperature 12°C. Bring an umbrella if you're going out.' What should you bring if going out?
questions.explanation: You should bring an umbrella if going out.

questions.question: Read the text: 'Doctor's Office: We are closed on weekends. For emergencies, please call 911. Regular appointments available Monday-Friday 9 AM-5 PM.' When is the doctor's office open?
questions.explanation: The doctor's office is open Monday-Friday.

questions.question: Read the text: 'Train Schedule: The 8:30 AM train to Central Station has been delayed by 15 minutes due to technical difficulties. We apologize for any inconvenience.' How long is the train delayed?
questions.explanation: The train is delayed by 15 minutes.

finalAssessment.title: A2 Level Final Assessment
finalAssessment.description: Comprehensive evaluation of A2 level skills and knowledge

questions.question: Complete: 'I ___ to the cinema last night.'
questions.explanation: Use past simple for completed actions in the past.

questions.question: Which word means 'a reduction in price'?
questions.explanation: A discount is a reduction in price.

questions.question: Complete: 'You ___ see a doctor if you feel sick.'
questions.explanation: Use 'should' for advice.

questions.question: What do you call a person you work with?
questions.explanation: A colleague is a person you work with.

questions.question: Complete: 'I ___ to visit my grandmother next week.'
questions.explanation: Use 'going to' for planned future actions.

questions.question: Read: 'SALE! All items 30% off. Limited time offer. No returns on sale items.' What percentage discount is offered?
questions.explanation: The sale offers 30% off.

questions.question: Read: 'Weather: Sunny today, high 25°C. Perfect day for outdoor activities.' What's the weather like?
questions.explanation: The weather is sunny.

questions.question: Read: 'Doctor's appointment available on Tuesday at 3 PM. Please call to confirm.' When is the appointment?
questions.explanation: The appointment is on Tuesday.

questions.question: Listen: 'The train to Central Station is now boarding at Platform 3.' Where should passengers go?
questions.explanation: Passengers should go to Platform 3.

questions.question: Listen: 'I have a terrible headache and fever.' What symptoms does the person have?
questions.explanation: The person has both headache and fever.

certificate.title: A2 Elementary English Certificate
certificate.description: This certificate confirms completion of A2 level English studies
criteria: Demonstrated understanding of basic grammar structures
Showed ability to communicate in simple everyday situations
Comprehended short texts and simple conversations
Used appropriate vocabulary for routine tasks
